channel.title: The LuxeOS Project
channel.description: Recent content on The LuxeOS Project

item.title: Downloads
item.description: You can download the latest pre-built ISO here. Current release: NONE

item.title: About
item.description: LuxeOS is a minimal and lightweight Operating System made for i386 and x86_64 architectures. Installation git clone https://github.com/luxeos/luxe-bootstrap ./bootstrap.sh Now you can run the produced ISO in a UEFI-enabled x86/x86_64 environment. System Requirements System requirements aren’t specified as of yet.
